pages.text: A group of legendary Greater Spirits, usually appearing in the form of wither skeletons, with their minions as skeletons. The Greater Spirits are bound to their minions in such fashion that they are virtually invulnerable until their minions have been sent back to $(thing)The Other Place$(). While it is incredibly dangerous to call on the Wild Hint, some summoners have been known to do so for quick access

to the rare wither skeleton skulls they are known to leave behind. Summoning the wild hunt is described in detail on the page on obtaining $(l:rituals/summoning/wither_skull)Wither Skeleton Skulls$(/l)
